title: Melissa Benoist
summary: Melissa Marie Benoist (/bəˈnɔɪt/ bə-NOYT;[1] born October 4, 1988)[2][3] is an American actress and singer. Her first major role was Marley Rose on the Fox musical comedy-drama Glee (2012–2014), where she was a series regular during the fifth season. She rose to widespread prominence for portraying the title character on the CBS / CW DC Comics-based superhero drama series Supergirl (2015–2021), along with related media in the Arrowverse franchise.
